statements: DELETE FROM historical_inventory_data WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' AND purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM historical_inventory_data WHERE quantity < 10 AND purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM sales_data WHERE total_price > 100 AND sales_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM inventory_data WHERE product_id = 101 AND date_added < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM sales_data WHERE sales_date >= '2022-03-01' AND total_price < 100.00;
DELETE FROM historical_inventory WHERE id = 1 AND product_name = 'appliances';
DELETE FROM historical_inventory_data WHERE item_id = 101 AND date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM trends_and_patterns WHERE pattern_id = 201 AND description = 'Irregular Pattern';
DELETE FROM trends WHERE trend_name = 'High Demand';
